Attendence Rate.Low: base on data set, Your attendence is too low go to this site to improve your attendence (https://www.iitms.co.in/blog/7-most-effective-strategies-to-improve-student-attendance.html)
Attendence Rate.High: Good Job! Keep attending the class regularly

Self Report Stress Level.High: Sine your stress level is high, You can pactice guided meditation, guided imagery, mindfulness, visualizeation and othe form of meditation anywhere at anytime, because it gives you a sense of calm, peace and balance that can help both your emotional well-being and your overall health.
Self Report Stress Level.Medium: If your stress level are medium you should connect yourself with others. Social contact is a good stress reliever because it can offer distraction, give support, and help you put up with life's up and downs. So take a coffee break with a friend, email a relative or visit your place of worship
Self Report Stress Level.Low: Almost any form of physical can act as a stress reliever. Even if your're not an athlete or you're out of shape, exercise can be a good stress reliever.

Participation.Yes: You are on the right path! Keep it up
Participation.No: Don't keep yourself isolated, Participate with friend can help your performance better.
